name: Amorphactor Pain, the Imagination Dracoverlord
effectText: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Amorphous Persona". If this card is Ritual Summoned, skip the Main Phase 1 of your opponent's next turn. Negate the effects of Fusion, Synchro, and Xyz Monsters while they are on the field. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can add 1 "Dracoverlord" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Amorphactor Pain, the Imagination Dracoverlord".
